items.title: Personalized Product Recommendations
items.description: Implement an AI-driven recommendation engine to suggest products to users based on browsing history, purchase history, and similar user behavior.
acceptance_criteria: System displays at least 5 relevant product recommendations on the homepage for logged-in users
Recommendations update in real-time based on recent user interactions
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate in A/B testing compared to baseline
non_functional: System supports at least 10,000 concurrent users
Data privacy compliance with GDPR and CCPA

notes: Assumed that the platform already has a product catalog and user account system. Requirement for AI recommendations is interpreted as personalized suggestions using machine learning models.
